pages.text: With this mod, you also have new ore materials, and with then you can create pretty much every type of item you usually get from ores.

Here we will only cover the overworld ores, but on the $(#e80059)$(l:magic_ores/magic_ores)$(bold)Challenge$() category, we will need to reference some other dimensions...$(br2)In order to mine the Formas, Gam and Milkshake ores, you need to get at least a Diamond Pickaxe, and it will drop from 2 to 5 nuggets of the ore.
With the dropped nuggets, you can craft ingots by filling the 9 craft spots, and with the ingots, you can build yourself full armor and toolsets (using the matching sticks for the tools of course)

Rui's Pantry also adds a tool set of $(bold)NETHERRACK$() that, even being really weak, supporting only about 10 uses, has a harvest level of 4, which stands for 1 tier higher than diamond, meaning it can handle everything diamond does and if in the presence of mods with higher harvest requirements, it can handle the level after diamond too!
This was added with the purpose of providing an easy and good way of getting tools in the nether.$(br2)$(bold)$(l:magic_ores/magic_ores)Next Category (Magic Ores)
